body: @meieru LOL WHAT ? i'm pretty sure it's the other way around, if you were a male previously and want to become a futa you would need to drill a hole in your below region (ouch) and ask whether someone want to donate their pussy (lol), catgirl ? it might take long but i'm sure it doesn't involve painful surgery.
